posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
For the Shaolin, I think a DEX-based Rogue / Monk / Fighter dual-wielding kamas would be best. I made one years ago that balances the Monk and Fighter levels to avoid EXP penalty, but it needs tweaking with what I have learned since then.

For the Battlerager, I am picturing a STR-based Fighter / Bard / RDD that can switch back and forth between dual-wielding a dwarven waraxe and a kukri and using a dwarvern waraxe and a shield. I recently made a silimar build that would need to be modified for this. Or, a Barbarian / Fighter ( / WM?) taking advantage of that Intimidate bonus for his Terrifying Rage.

For the Swashbuckler, I like the idea of a DEX-based Rogue / Fighter / WM either using rapier and shield or rapier and short sword.

For the Kender, a stealthy DEX-based Rogue / Fighter / CoT would do well.

posts.author: HipRedux
posts.content:
KidMiracleman wrote:
Sounds good.  How about a paladin 20 / monk 10 / rogue 10 ??
Never gotten into the whole subrace deal myself, but am thinking a high-stealth Dexer ED BG/mnk/rog would do well with the stacked sneaks. But the problem will be identical in both cases... you'll need a lot of CHA to make the commitment to either DivGrace or DarkBlessg pay off.  Else, just way too feat-starved either combo over fighter. PA/DivMight would be nice for a Dexer to draw upon as well but where to shove it in?  Tight fit if even possible with all the subrace shenanigans.

Is this a server where you need to take a minimum number of each class before switching?

posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
No minimum before switching.  There is a nice Paladin relic amulet that gives a character hide in plain sight plus other stuff.  It
would be great for a dex paladin but one has to have at least 20 levels of paladin to use it.  Though the relic claims you
need 25 levels.  I am trying to think of a good build that will give me a naked AC of at least 35 if not 40.  I made a Fighter
DD monk that has a naked AC of 45.  It is very nice.  If I can get something like that with epic dodge that would be awesome

David

posts.author: HipRedux
posts.content:
There's a high-stealth, high-detection LE ED halfling rog11/mnk10/asn19 that gets AC 37 + 10 w/ImpExpertise with 41 AB melee.  The asn darkness lasts about 2 turns and the ImpInv about 10 hrs.  16d6 sneaks.  Your choice of kama or unarmed.  Either works to retain the monk progression.

:edit: ooops... forgot to add Dodge.  That reaches AC 38.  Probably that Kender halfing the best fit subrace-wise so add another racial Dex AC makes AC 39.  HiPS would be a handy addition for a toon with stealth skills like this around 60-ish.  Too bad about the lack of a taunt class.  That +20 would have made it nasty vs. casters.  Dunno what "favored class none" means, though.  Without the normal halfling favored class, you'd need to play games alternating with class sequence as to not incur -20% XP penalty for a portion, but they can be kept close for the entire build.
